title: Long queue times
body: Has anyone else noticed queue times have increased since the most recent patch? I'm plat MMR and my queue times have increased from about 1min to about 5 mins, even in norms when we have a 5 man queue the queue times are so much longer.

replies.body:
In bronze. Currently queuing in ranked for 20min on an estimated 2.5min. 

Pretty much been this way no matter what time i try for about a week or so (always ranked)
Just been told I've got 5 more min. If I don't get into game its another day I cant play. Havent played this week because of the queue times.
Possibly because world's are on at the moment maybe everyone is just watching that instead of playing
I think people are watching LCS more maybe
